name: Test Case 18: View Category Products
description:
1. Launch browser
2. Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
3. Verify that categories are visible on left side bar
4. Click on 'Women' category
5. Click on any category link under 'Women' category, for example: Dress
6. Verify that category page is displayed and confirm text 'WOMEN - DRESS PRODUCTS'
7. On left side bar, click on any sub-category link of 'Men' category
8. Verify that user is navigated to that category page
descriptionHtml:
1. Launch browser
  2. Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
  3. Verify that categories are visible on left side bar
  4. Click on 'Women' category
  5. Click on any category link under 'Women' category, for example: Dress
  6. Verify that category page is displayed and confirm text 'WOMEN - DRESS PRODUCTS'
  7. On left side bar, click on any sub-category link of 'Men' category
  8. Verify that user is navigated to that category page
statusMessage: Verify that category page is displayed and confirm text 'WOMEN - DRESS PRODUCTS' expected [WOMEN - DRESS PRODUCTS] but found [WOMEN -  DRESS PRODUCTS]
